page.title: 18RUNNING FROM MOUNTSORREL
page.content: {The Friend's Of Mountsorrel Young {Athletes}form part of{Charnwood A.C.. The group comprises approx.{50 boys {and girls, aged from 10-17. The group {is based at Rolls Royce,}where there is a bungalow used as a weight room, equipment store and meeting place. Facilities at Rolls Royce are used plus the all weather track at Loughborough University, with Bradgate Park and The Charnwood Forest being used for longer runs, stamina and endurance training. During its life, the group has expanded considerably, both in numbers and in the activities undertaken. This year the girls' U.13 section became the Midland Womens AAA X-Country Champions, and many of the boys represented the track and field team that gained promotion to the Midland Premier Division of The National Young Athletes League.
